overview:
Elliot Jacobs is the Co-Founder of Bizual.

He began his career as a freelance web designer and programmer, working for small businesses and charities.

After two years he joined London-based digital agency, Score Communications, as Head of Creative Service, overseeing the creative strategy for all web design and online marketing campaigns.

He later became Digital Director at award-winning advertising agency, catchpole&friends, where he developed online marketing campaigns for Visa, Unilever, McAfee, PayPal and Epson.

Most recently he has worked as an online marketing consultant developing websites and online marketing strategy for The Royal Cancer Campaign, Anglian Home Improvements. He has also worked with LinkedIn, the worldâ€™s largest online professional network and Tribe Wanted, recently voted â€˜Best Social Networkâ€™ at the â€˜Broadcast Digital Media Awardsâ€™.

Elliot lives and works in London, UK.
